definitions.title: interj.
definitions.body: (onomtop.) expressing joy, Aha ! always introduced by [[אָמַר]], Is 44:16 he says, Aha, I am warm, I have seen the fire. Of satisfaction over the misfortune of an enemy or rival, Ps 35:21, Ps 35:25 let them not say in their heart [[הֶאָח נַפְשֵׁנוּ]] Aha, so would we have it ! (lit our desire !) Ps 40:16 (= Ps 70:4), Ez Eze 25:3, Eze 26:2, Eze 36:2. Metaph., of the neighing of a war horse in the battle, Job 39:25.
